name: Shower Arm Round Heavy Casted 450 mm Long
description: There are only a few selected things that spell class. The brilliant collection of shower faucets by Hindware is one such beauty that renders you a showering experience like none other. A soulful unison of artistic features and superior performance – every shower is crafted to give you a refreshing shower after a hard day. From overhead massage showers to round rain showers – each style, cut and curve lends you a unique experience; turning your everyday showers into a royal affair.

name: Immacula Shower Arm Heavy Casted Body Without Wall Flange
description: When you think of a crown, you think of royalty. The Immacula collection embraces the pureness, richness and opulence that comes with that very royalty in an immaculate fashion. name: Contessa Plus Shower Arm Heavy Casted Body
description: Staying true to its inspiration from the purest form of water flow, the Contessa Plus takes it one further by marrying classical design with beautiful modern forms. The contours of this range of bathroom and kitchen faucets are inviting, uplifting the practical details into poetic shapes. The result is a design that is innovative and awe-inspiring, simple yet quietly stunning. The designs are not overpowering, allowing the owner to add his or her individualistic style to the bathroom or kitchen area.

name: Geometric Towel Ring
description: Inspired by the Rubbic’s cube, this range is about clean design and crisp planes. The accessories display bold geometric shapes with brilliant engineering. This collection takes into account the fact that the modern bathroom requires relaxing designs. It shows in the craftsmanship that evokes a sense of awe and calm, both at the same time. The result is an intriguing design that is at once alluring and Zen-like in its beauty.

name: Classik Shower Arm Light Body
description: The Classik collection is inspired by an aura of contemporariness, with an ode to classic craftsmanship. Combine those simple aesthetics with timeless appeal, and you have a range that is unmatched in comfort, value and functionality. Every faucet in this range is visually appealing and designed to maintain the aesthetics of a contemporary decor. There are also several practical, easy-to-use features, designed keeping in mind the modern busy home.
